BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.hive.dml.HiveInsertStatement.setSetAssignment(SetAssignmentSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into HiveInsertStatement.setAssignment

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.hive.dml.HiveSelectStatement.setTable(SimpleTableSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into HiveSelectStatement.table
